text: In pichey chodey janey waley badwi(bedouin) arabon se kehna ke â€œankareeb tumhein aisey logon se ladne ke liye bulaya jayega jo badey zoarawar hain. Tumko unse jung karni hogi ya woh mutii (surrender) ho jayenge. Us waqt agar tumne hukum e jihad ki itaat ki to Allah tumhein accha ajar dega. Aur agar tum phir usi tarah mooh moad gaye jis tarah pehle moad chuke ho to Allah tumko dardnaak saza dega
